NK036(chi)014:1: // shin tu spros med kyi dbang bzhugs /
NK036(chi)014:2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa thams cad dang bral ba la phyag 'a tshal lo //
NK036(chi)014:3: da ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i dbang rig
NK036(chi)014:4: pa mngon sum du ston pa'i cho ga 'di la
NK036(chi)014:9: bla ma dang slob ma'i sngon 'agro'o //
NK036(chi)014:10: dang po ni 'jig rten pa'i yon tan dang ldan
NK036(chi)014:11: pa gzhung las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi slob
NK036(chi)014:12: mas / zhu ba phul ba'i dus su lo gsum gyi bar du snod brtags la /
NK036(chi)014:13: skal ba dang ldan pa gsum tshun chad la dbang sbyin te /
NK036(chi)014:14: de'i dus su rang gi bla ma las dngos sam yid kyis dbang blang ba dang /
NK036(chi)014:15: lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa brtsams pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:16: rig pa mngon sum gyi don nyung ngu yang zhag nyer gcig tu bsgoms te /
NK036(chi)014:17: slob ma yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
NK036(chi)014:18: gnyis pa slob ma'i sngon du bya ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:19: 'jig rten gyi bya ba rnams spangs la /
NK036(chi)014:20: gsang sngags kyi thabs lam legs par sbyangs nas /
NK036(chi)014:21: bla ma mnyes pa gsum gyis mnyes par byas la zhu'o //
NK036(chi)014:23: slob ma kun la dri sna tshogs dang /
NK036(chi)014:25: chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas nas /
NK036(chi)014:26: a nyer gcig gis rgyas gdab la /
NK036(chi)014:27: sbyong ba'i sngon 'gror bar chad bsrung bar bya ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:28: slob ma rnams bla ma'i mdun du langs pa /
NK036(chi)014:29: thal mo snying gar sbyar te /
NK036(chi)014:30: bla mas slob ma'i bgegs bskrad phyir //
NK036(chi)014:31: stod g.yogs dag ni phud nas ni //
NK036(chi)014:32: shar du kha bltas stangs stabs bya //
NK036(chi)014:33: rnam shes brgyad kyi sgo bsrung phyir //
NK036(chi)014:34: yi ge brgyad kyis rgyas gdab bo //
NK036(chi)014:35: slob ma'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu yang //
NK036(chi)014:36: h+aum gcig bsgoms zhes tshig brjod la //
NK036(chi)014:37: bla mas ting 'dzin gsal ba yis //
NK036(chi)014:38: slob ma'i snying gi rtse mo na //
NK036(chi)014:39: d+r+wa ba can gyi rtsa nang du //
NK036(chi)014:40: h+aum dang shes pa bcas pa gzhug /
NK036(chi)014:41: bu lus sngo skya'i h'u du bsgom //
NK036(chi)014:42: lte bar ram dmar ljang dang mtshungs //
NK036(chi)014:43: mgrin par kham ni dud kha'o //
NK036(chi)014:44: dpral bar e ni mthing kha bsgom //
NK036(chi)014:45: lkog mar su nyid ser po'o //
NK036(chi)014:46: ha zhes pus mo g.yas bsgoms la //
NK036(chi)014:47: yang na rkang mthil phata yig ni //
NK036(chi)014:48: sngo nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs su bsgom //
NK036(chi)014:49: 'di ni 'jigs rten gyi bgegs rnams kyi nus pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK036(chi)014:50: slob ma rang gi rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad /
NK036(chi)014:51: phyis yul la mi skye bar bya ba'i don no //
NK036(chi)014:52: de nas yi ge brgyad kyi tha ma phata yig ni ngag tu zlos su yang gzhug go //
NK036(chi)014:53: dbugs re la nyer gcig re bzlas shing dur khrod du btang ngo //
NK036(chi)014:54: de nas slob mas dur khrod du phyin pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:55: sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang /
NK036(chi)014:56: me tog sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma gnyis kyis mkha' 'gro ma rnams mchod la /
NK036(chi)014:57: bdag gi bar chad nye bar zhi bar gyis shig pa'i gsol ba btab la /
NK036(chi)014:58: lus ru shan byed pa'i spyod pa la zhag gcig bya /
NK036(chi)014:59: de bzhin du ngag ru shan 'byed pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:60: sems ru shan 'byed pa zhag re re byas la /
NK036(chi)014:61: rjes su phyag dang bskor ba 'don zlos dang /
NK036(chi)014:62: chos dang mthun pa'i lus ngag gi spyod lam bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:63: ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa dngos ni khrid yig bzhin bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:65: dngos gzhi la man+dala 'bul zhing gsol ba gdab pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:67: stong pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:69: rig pa mngon sum gyi brda' dbang bskur ba dang lnga'o //
NK036(chi)014:71: gnas shin tu dben par nyi ma rtse shar la slob mas dbul rgyu'i man+dala rin po che lnga /
NK036(chi)014:77: bla ma'i brda'i man+dala me tog kha dog lnga'am /
NK036(chi)014:78: tshon gyis bris pa gang yang rung ba gcig bya /
NK036(chi)014:79: mchod pa dang gtor ma ci 'byor bar bsham mo //
NK036(chi)014:80: de nas slob ma rnams bla ma'i mdun du phyag byas te /
NK036(chi)014:81: thal mo sbyar te 'dug la bla mas 'di skad du /
NK036(chi)014:82: khyod su yin zhes lan gsum mo //
NK036(chi)014:83: slob mas kyang bdag skal ldan yid gyi bu gcig lags zhes lan gdab bo //
NK036(chi)014:85: de ltar yin phan chad rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen
NK036(chi)014:86: po'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing nyams dga' ba 'dir zhugs
NK036(chi)014:88: de dag gi don ni 'khor ba rang rgyud du 'dzin pa'i ming spong ba dang /
NK036(chi)014:89: yid kyi rig pa mthong bar bya ba dang /
NK036(chi)014:90: dbyings rig gi dkyil 'khor 'di bzang po zhes bya ba'i don no //
NK036(chi)014:91: de nas man+dala lnga po 'bul te /
NK036(chi)014:92: bla ma dang rgyal ba sras bcas mdun gyi nam mkha' la dmigs te /
NK036(chi)014:93: phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
NK036(chi)014:94: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK036(chi)014:95: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang //
NK036(chi)014:96: dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus la //
NK036(chi)014:97: stong gsum 'jig rten thams cad kun //
NK036(chi)014:98: gser la sogs pa'i rin chen lngas //
NK036(chi)014:99: yongs su gang bar dmigs nas ni //
NK036(chi)014:100: bla ma rdo rje can la 'bul //
NK036(chi)014:101: de bzhin sna tshogs 'bru lnga dang //
NK036(chi)014:102: dri mchog rnam pa lnga rnams dang //
NK036(chi)014:103: sna tshogs me tog 'di rnams kun //
NK036(chi)014:104: bla ma rdo rje can la 'bul //
NK036(chi)014:105: thugs rjes dgongs la bzhes su gsol //
NK036(chi)014:106: bzhes nas byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK036(chi)014:107: gu ru man+da la p+au dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye h+aum /
NK036(chi)014:110: rin po che lnga ni ye shes lnga'i ngo bo la longs spyod pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:111: 'bru rnam pa lnga ni 'bras bu sku lngar ston cig pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:112: dri lnga ni chos nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye
NK036(chi)014:113: shes dris lus thams cad tshim par mdzod cig pa'i
NK036(chi)014:114: barda'o // sman sna tshogs pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:115: bdag la phyi nang gi sdug bsngal kun dang bral bar mdzod cig pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:116: thun mong gi dngos grub ni tshe gcig la rang gi nor 'phel ba'i don du nor dang /
NK036(chi)014:117: de bzhin nyid zad mi shes pa'i phyir na rin po che dang /
NK036(chi)014:118: mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir na 'bru dang /
NK036(chi)014:119: dbang po gsal ba'i phyir na dri dang /
NK036(chi)014:120: nad kyi sdug bsngal las grol ba'i phyir na sman dang /
NK036(chi)014:121: shes rab dang dad pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod pa'i phyir na me tog dang /
NK036(chi)014:122: de dag ni thun mong du thob par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
NK036(chi)014:123: gsol ba gdab pa ni mdun gyi nam mkhar bla
NK036(chi)014:124: ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams dmigs la ngag
NK036(chi)014:126: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
NK036(chi)014:127: zag pa rang zad dbyings nas skur bzhengs pa'i //
NK036(chi)014:128: dri ma rang dag dbyings las spyan gzigs la //
NK036(chi)014:129: thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i //
NK036(chi)014:130: bde gshegs 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i //
NK036(chi)014:131: dgongs pa nyag gcig mi g.yo dbyer med pa'i //
NK036(chi)014:132: sngon bzhugs dur khrod gnas nas rjes dgongs la //
NK036(chi)014:133: rang bzhin mdzad pa gang yang mi mnga' yang //
NK036(chi)014:134: sangs rgyas kun dngos kun tu bzang po'i sku //
NK036(chi)014:135: bdag blo mos pa'i don phyir 'dir gshegs la //
NK036(chi)014:136: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs //
NK036(chi)014:138: sangs rgyas kun mnga' rdo rje 'chang chen dang //
NK036(chi)014:139: rig 'dzin chen po dga' rab rdo rje dang //
NK036(chi)014:140: sangs rgyas thub pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sku //
NK036(chi)014:141: rig 'dzin chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen dang //
NK036(chi)014:142: rig 'dzin chen po sh+r+ai sing ha dang //
NK036(chi)014:143: rig 'dzin chen po dz+ny+aa na s+au tra dang //
NK036(chi)014:144: rig 'dzin chen po bi ma mi tra dang //
NK036(chi)014:145: rig 'dzin chen po ting 'dzin bzang po dang //
NK036(chi)014:146: gnas brtan ldang ma lhun gyi rgyal mtshan dang //
NK036(chi)014:147: bla ma lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug dang //
NK036(chi)014:148: zhang ston chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang //
NK036(chi)014:149: bla med brgyud 'dzin nyi ma 'bum dang ni //
NK036(chi)014:150: byin rlabs mchog ldan gu ru jo 'ber dang //
NK036(chi)014:151: bla ma chen po sam ga lak+sha la //
NK036(chi)014:152: bdag blo mos pa'i don phyir gsol ba 'debs //
NK036(chi)014:153: zhes re re nas brjod pa'am /
NK036(chi)014:155: de nas rtsa ba'i bla ma la 'di skad do //
NK036(chi)014:156: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin rnams dgongs su gsol /
NK036(chi)014:157: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
NK036(chi)014:162: bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK036(chi)014:163: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du /
NK036(chi)014:164: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos bdag gi lus byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK036(chi)014:165: bdag gi ngag byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK036(chi)014:166: bdag gi sems byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK036(chi)014:167: bdag gi snang ba byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK036(chi)014:174: 'di nyid gsang sngags rnams kyi bcud //
NK036(chi)014:175: ma btsal ye nas gnas pa'i don //
NK036(chi)014:176: rang la yod pa'i don de nyid //
NK036(chi)014:177: brda' la brten nas dmigs la bskur //
NK036(chi)014:178: shes rab kyis ni brtags dpyad min //
NK036(chi)014:179: dbang po'i sgo la mngon sum du //
NK036(chi)014:180: snang ba'i ye shes gtan dbab phyir //
NK036(chi)014:183: gnyis pa ye shes dbab pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:184: 'di thams cad brda' yin pas bla mas 'di skad brjod cing bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:185: lus chas rab tu phyung mdun du langs la rkang pa gnyis bshibs mig gnyis ma 'gyur bar ltos /
NK036(chi)014:187: bla ma'i thugs kyi dkyil du shes pa gtod /
NK036(chi)014:188: rang rig pa'i me tog phul zhes bstan no //
NK036(chi)014:189: de nas bla mas bu'i sems bzung bar bya ba'i
NK036(chi)014:190: phyir a a zhes drug brtsegs su shes pa yongs
NK036(chi)014:191: su bor ba'i mtshams su brjod /
NK036(chi)014:192: des ni yid kyi bu gcig pu //
NK036(chi)014:193: lus ni g.yo bar nye bar dang //
NK036(chi)014:194: ngag ni smra zhing 'phar ba dang //
NK036(chi)014:195: sems ni bde bas myos pa dang //
NK036(chi)014:196: rig pa tshud pa'i rtags su bshad //
NK036(chi)014:198: man+dala dang rig pa'i me tog 'bul ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:199: khyad par gyi don te bla ma'i thugs dang gnyis su med pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:201: rig pa la 'khor ba'i nyes pa med pa'i brda' yin /
NK036(chi)014:203: rtag tu nam mkha' dang bral bar mi phyed pa'i brda' yin /
NK036(chi)014:204: rkang pa gnyis gshibs pa ni lus thabs mig shes
NK036(chi)014:205: rab yin pas mig la shes pa ma 'gyur bar
NK036(chi)014:206: ltos shig ces pa'i brda' yin no //
NK036(chi)014:207: thal mo snying khar sbyar ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:208: rig pa snying la gnas pa'i brda' yin /
NK036(chi)014:209: bla ma'i thugs kyi dkyil du shes pa gtad pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:210: bla ma'i thugs dang gnyis su med pa'i brda' yin /
NK036(chi)014:211: sems gzhan du ma yengs par gyis shig ces pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:212: rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ma yengs par ltos shig pa'i brda' yin no //
NK036(chi)014:213: bla mas bu'i shes pa mi btang ba'i phyir a a zhes glu dang bcas pas bcug pas /
NK036(chi)014:214: ma byas pa'i ye shes rang chas su skye ba'i brda' yin no //
NK036(chi)014:215: slob ma'i lus ngag la rtags g.yo ba dang 'phar ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:216: ye shes de nyid ma byas pa'i ye shes rang lugs su 'bab pa'i brda' yin no //
NK036(chi)014:217: gsum pa stong pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:218: slob ma kha shar gyi phyogs su bltas la nam mkhar 'gro bar bsam du bcug ste /
NK036(chi)014:220: e ma skal ldan shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams la phar gam gam song dang /
NK036(chi)014:221: zhes brjod pa'i mtshams dag tu /
NK036(chi)014:223: slar ldog na ldog sa 'dug gam /
NK036(chi)014:227: byang du yang brjod par bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:228: de nas bla ma'i phyag gis nam mkha' la lan gsum g.yug par bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:229: de dag gi don ni stong pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir 'jug pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:230: 'gro 'ong gi sa med pa'i brda' yin /
NK036(chi)014:231: phyag nam mkha' la lan gsum g.yug pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:232: snang ba thugs rje 'gag pa med pa sprul sku'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK036(chi)014:233: phyed snang gsung gi rang bzhin longs sku'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK036(chi)014:234: mi snang ba thugs kyi ngo bo chos sku'i rang bzhin te /
NK036(chi)014:235: sku gsum stong par gcig pa'i brda' yin no //
NK036(chi)014:236: bzhi pa lha ngo bstan pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:237: slob mas gos gyon skyil krung bcas la /
NK036(chi)014:238: nam mkha' nyi ma lnga 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba la sems gtod du bcug la /
NK036(chi)014:240: e ma bu khyod skal dang ldan //
NK036(chi)014:241: nam mkha'i steng du yar ltos dang //
NK036(chi)014:242: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba de la shes pa gtod la je mtho je mthor thong zhig /
NK036(chi)014:243: ces lan gsum brjod pa'i 'og tu /
NK036(chi)014:247: nam mkha' la ltos dang zhes bya ba ni ma
NK036(chi)014:248: byas pa'i rigs pa ye shes kyi lha ngo bstan
NK036(chi)014:249: pa yin / yang nam mkha' na nyi ma la shes pa gtod pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:250: de nyid ye shes lnga'i snang ba yin pas de
NK036(chi)014:251: las phyir ma ldog cig ces pa'i brda' yin no
NK036(chi)014:252: // lnga pa rig pa mngon sum gyi brda' dbang dngos ni /
NK036(chi)014:253: langs te gyad gyi dor thabs 'dug /
NK036(chi)014:254: mdzub mo bsgrengs te mig btsugs la //
NK036(chi)014:255: a a zhes brjod phyogs bzhir blta //
NK036(chi)014:256: yang ni mdzub mo nam mkhar bsgrengs //
NK036(chi)014:257: mig ni har po dag tu blta //
NK036(chi)014:258: ngag tu nam mkha' 'di rgya che'o //
NK036(chi)014:261: bla mas g.yas brkyang ba ni 'khor ba'i spros pa /
NK036(chi)014:262: g.yon bskum pa ni 'das pa'i snang ba /
NK036(chi)014:263: bgas yangs su spyod cig pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:264: mdzub mo bsgrengs nas mig la btsugs te phyogs bzhir blta ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:265: rig pa mngon sum gyi snang ba /
NK036(chi)014:267: rig pa tshad phebs kyi snang ba /
NK036(chi)014:268: chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba ste /
NK036(chi)014:269: snang ba bzhis rim pas 'char ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:270: mdzub mo nam mkhar bsgrengs pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:271: rig pa lu gu rgyud mkha' la snang ba'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:272: mig har por lta ba ni lta stangs 'di ltar yin pa'i barda'o //
NK036(chi)014:273: nam mkha' 'di ni 'di ltar rgya che'o zhes pa
NK036(chi)014:274: ni 'di ltar byas pas snang ba 'di rang zad
NK036(chi)014:275: la 'gro bas ye shes kyi snang ba skye ba'i
NK036(chi)014:276: barda'o // de rnams kyis dngos gzhi'i gdams ngag bstan nas /
NK036(chi)014:277: de ltar brda dbang bskur dus su //
NK036(chi)014:278: nyams su myong ba lhag tu skye //
NK036(chi)014:279: gal te ma skyes srid na yang //
NK036(chi)014:280: de dag brda ni bla mas bkrol //
NK036(chi)014:281: so so'i nyams dang mthun par bshad //
NK036(chi)014:282: ces gsungs kyang 'dir brda' rnams zhor la bkrol lo //
NK036(chi)014:284: tshogs dang gtor ma gtang yon dbul lo //
NK036(chi)014:285: de nas ngo sprod pa'am dbang gong ma byed na /
NK036(chi)014:286: de nas rnal du 'bebs pa yi //
NK036(chi)014:287: cho ga mkhas pas zhag gsum bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:288: de nas sems kyi sna khrid pa'i sngon 'gro rnams la'ang sbyang bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:289: zhes gsungs pa'i rang gzhan gyi lta sgom spyod pa
NK036(chi)014:290: drug skor gyi man ngag rnams bstan par bya ste
NK036(chi)014:292: de nas rab tu spros med kyi dbang gis lung bstan cing dbugs dbyung bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)014:293: shin tu spros pa med pa'i dbang slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:294: bi ma la'i rgyab yig bsres nas rang byung rdo rjes bsgrigs pa rdzogs so //////
NK036(chi)014:295: rab tu spros med kyi dbang bzhugs /
NK036(chi)014:296: bya bral lhun rdzogs ngang la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK036(chi)014:297: da ni rab tu spros pa med pa'i dbang sems
NK036(chi)014:298: kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du ston pa bshad par
NK036(chi)014:299: bya'o // gong du dbang gsum rdzogs pa'i skyes bu la /
NK036(chi)014:300: snga dro dang po mchod pa dang gtor ma bsham /
NK036(chi)014:301: man+dala mnyam zhing zlum po la /
NK036(chi)014:302: gser gyi tshom bu bkod la bla ma la dbul /
NK036(chi)014:303: ye shes kyi snang ba skyed pa'i don du bla ma shar du blta /
NK036(chi)014:304: 'jig rten gyi snang ba nub pa'i phyir slob ma nub tu bltas te /
NK036(chi)014:306: shes pa gzhan du ma yengs par rtse gcig tu
NK036(chi)014:307: sems nyid skye ba med pa'i don mngon du rtogs
NK036(chi)014:309: de nas bla mas bu khyod su yin zhes dris pas slob mas lan du /
NK036(chi)014:310: bdag skal ldan sems kyi bu gcig pu lags zhes lan gsum mo //
NK036(chi)014:312: de ltar yin phan chad sems nyid gdod ma nas skye ma myong ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs shig /
NK036(chi)014:314: de nas bla ma phyag 'tshal te gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:315: kye ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
NK036(chi)014:316: bdag la rab tu dgongs su gsol //
NK036(chi)014:317: bdag ni khams gsum 'khor gnas su //
NK036(chi)014:318: yun ring gnas pas dran nyams te //
NK036(chi)014:319: 'khor ba nyid las brgal don du //
NK036(chi)014:320: bla ma la yang zhu ba bgyid //
NK036(chi)014:321: bskal pa brgya phrag du mar ni //
NK036(chi)014:322: bdag ni yang nas yang 'khor bas //
NK036(chi)014:323: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang byung ye shes nyid //
NK036(chi)014:324: rang dang rtsa ba bcad pas sangs rgyas sems las byung //
NK036(chi)014:325: sems kyi dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol //
NK036(chi)014:329: bla ma la sems gtad de shes pa ma yengs par sems rtse gcig tu 'dzin du gzhug go //
NK036(chi)014:330: de nas rnam rtog gnas pa'i mtshams su bla mas
NK036(chi)014:331: glo bur du drag shul dang bcas pas 'di skad
NK036(chi)014:332: brjod / sems gang yin zhes lan gsum mo //
NK036(chi)014:333: de la shes pa'i nyams myong ni //
NK036(chi)014:335: brjod par dka' ba'i don de nyid //
NK036(chi)014:336: slob ma'i rgyud la skye bar 'gyur //
NK036(chi)014:339: da ltar gyi shes pa gsal la mi rtog pa /
NK036(chi)014:343: bar dbang po la rtog pas btsal kyang mi rnyed /
NK036(chi)014:344: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i shes rab
NK036(chi)014:345: rang byung gi sgron ma ngos bzung nas 'jog pa
NK036(chi)014:346: ni dbang gi dngos gzhi ste /
NK036(chi)014:347: 'dis sems kyi dri ma sbyong zhing /
NK036(chi)014:348: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa khregs chod du skye ba'i phyir ro //
NK036(chi)014:349: de nas lung bstan pa'i slob ma shar du bltar
NK036(chi)014:350: bcug la seng ge lta bu'i 'dug stangs pus mo
NK036(chi)014:353: lag pa pus mo'i phyi logs su btsugs nas /
NK036(chi)014:354: 'phongs yid tsam phyir phyung sgal tshigs drang bar byas te /
NK036(chi)014:355: yid la chos nyid skye ba med pa byas nas /
NK036(chi)014:357: e ma skal ldan sems kyi bu gcig pu /
NK036(chi)014:358: khyod shar phyogs na mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams shin tu mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba na /
NK036(chi)014:359: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)014:360: rang rang gi ston pa las chos nyan cing /
NK036(chi)014:361: rang rang gi nye 'khor la chos ston pa /
NK036(chi)014:362: rang rang gi sems kyi dam pa 'od gsal bas gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston to //
NK036(chi)014:363: bu khyod der glang po che'i lta stangs kyis ltos la seng ge'i mchongs stabs kyis song zhig /
NK036(chi)014:364: a a zhes rgyas gdab bo //
NK036(chi)014:365: yang lhor glang po che'i 'dug stangs ni pus mo sa la gtad la /
NK036(chi)014:366: lag pa gnyis su gru mo pus mo'i mdun du btsugs /
NK036(chi)014:367: mgo pus mo'i steng du dun te byas la /
NK036(chi)014:368: lag mthil gnyis kyis 'gram pa cung zad brten mig smin mtshams lhor bltar bcug la /
NK036(chi)014:370: e ma skal ldan sems kyi bu khyod lho phyogs
NK036(chi)014:371: na dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams
NK036(chi)014:372: mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba na /
NK036(chi)014:373: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)014:374: rang rang gi ston pa las chos nyan cing /
NK036(chi)014:375: rang rang gi 'khor la chos ston pa /
NK036(chi)014:376: rang rang gi sems kyi dam pa 'od gsal bas /
NK036(chi)014:377: gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston to //
NK036(chi)014:378: bu khyod der seng ge'i lta stangs kyis ltos la /
NK036(chi)014:379: stag mo'i mchongs stabs kyis song zhig /
NK036(chi)014:381: yang nub tu drang srong gi 'dug stangs ni skyil
NK036(chi)014:382: skrung la tsog pur byas la gru mo pus mo'i
NK036(chi)014:384: lag pa gnyis 'gram pa'i zur la brten nas lus bsrang ste nub phyogs su bltas la /
NK036(chi)014:386: e ma skal ldan sems kyi bu khyod nub phyogs
NK036(chi)014:387: na pad+ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams mdzes
NK036(chi)014:389: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)014:390: rang rang gi ston pa las chos nyan cing rang rang gi nye 'khor la chos ston pa /
NK036(chi)014:391: rang rang gi sems kyi dam pa 'od gsal bas gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston to //
NK036(chi)014:392: bu khyod der dpal chen po'i rngam stabs kyis ltos la /
NK036(chi)014:393: khyung nam mkhar lding ba'i 'gros kyis song zhig /
NK036(chi)014:394: a a a zhes brjod do //
NK036(chi)014:395: yang byang du bya rgod kyi spungs stangs ni /
NK036(chi)014:396: rkang pa gnyis mnyam par mthil sa la sbyar ba /
NK036(chi)014:397: lag pa'i mthil pus mo'i steng du byas /
NK036(chi)014:398: gru mo gnyis mkhal du bzhag ste /
NK036(chi)014:399: rked pa bsrangs mig mdun phyogs su bltas te /
NK036(chi)014:401: e ma skal ldan sems kyi bu khyod 'di nas
NK036(chi)014:402: byang phyogs na las rab yongs su grub pa zhes
NK036(chi)014:403: bya ba'i zhing khams mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba
NK036(chi)014:404: na / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
NK036(chi)014:405: ldan 'das gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya
NK036(chi)014:406: ba rang rang gi ston pa las chos nyan cing
NK036(chi)014:407: na / / rang rang gi nye 'khor la chos ston pa /
NK036(chi)014:408: rang rang gi sems kyi dam pa 'od gsal bas /
NK036(chi)014:409: gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston to //
NK036(chi)014:410: bu khyod der rdo rje 'chang gi lta stangs kyis ltos la /
NK036(chi)014:411: glog dmar 'khyug pa'i stangs stabs kyis song zhig /
NK036(chi)014:412: a a a zhes rgyas gdab bo //
NK036(chi)014:414: shar na rab tu dkar ba'i gzugs dang /
NK036(chi)014:418: byang ljang khu'i kha dog gis mdzes shing 'od 'phro ba /
NK036(chi)014:419: mngal gyi grong khyer du mi 'jug par /
NK036(chi)014:420: rdzus te skyes nas lo lnga brgya dag na chos
NK036(chi)014:421: nyid la bar do med par sangs rgya bar nges
NK036(chi)014:422: te / shar du sprul sku'i zhal mthong /
NK036(chi)014:425: byang du las dang bag chags kyi mtha' zad nas sangs rgyas pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:427: lnga brgya dag ni nges par byed //
NK036(chi)014:428: ces 'byung bas 'di thob pa'i yon tan yin no //
NK036(chi)014:430: slob ma rdo rje skyil krung du 'dug la mnyam par bzhag ste /
NK036(chi)014:432: e ma skal ldan sems kyi bu gcig pu khyod nyon cig /
NK036(chi)014:433: de dag thams cad 'das pa'i pha rol na rgya
NK036(chi)014:434: na thams cad yong su bkod pa zhes bya ba
NK036(chi)014:435: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams ye shes lnga khyab cing gsal ba /
NK036(chi)014:436: rab tu mnyam zhing mi g.yo ba nyid na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
NK036(chi)014:440: lha dang mi rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i ston pa /
NK036(chi)014:443: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
NK036(chi)014:444: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu
NK036(chi)014:445: med pa zhes bya ba 'khor yang dag par rdzogs
NK036(chi)014:446: pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig
NK036(chi)014:447: dpag tu med pa rnams kyis bskor ba /
NK036(chi)014:448: sems nyid mngon pa ra 'dus ma byas pa mngon par rol pa zhig yod kyis /
NK036(chi)014:449: bu khyod der glang po zlum po /
NK036(chi)014:450: che'i lta stangs kyis ltos dbyings /
NK036(chi)014:452: seng ge'i mchongs stabs thad kar /
NK036(chi)014:456: nam mkha' la lding ba'i 'gros kyis sku 'dug la drang srong gi 'dug stangs mdun /
NK036(chi)014:459: nyal thabs kyis nyol thig ler zhig /
NK036(chi)014:463: skye bu'i stang rgyangs stabs kyis rgyongs ye shes /
NK036(chi)014:469: kyi spungs stangs kyis spungs zhing khams /
NK036(chi)014:472: kyi 'dor stabs kyis sa nyan thos /
NK036(chi)014:474: 'bu g.yas srin gyi nur 'gros sa la 'chag par gyis rang rgyal /
NK036(chi)014:476: stag dred mo'i mchongs stabs kyis rtsal sbyongs byang sems shig /
NK036(chi)014:477: yangs sems kyi bu sems nyid gnas pa'i gzhi zungs shig /
NK036(chi)014:478: sems brtan pa'i gnas tshugs shig /
NK036(chi)014:479: sems nyid 'gyu bas rtsal sbyongs shig /
NK036(chi)014:480: sems nyid khyab pas rtags tshol zhig /
NK036(chi)014:481: sems nyid myur ba la zlos shig /
NK036(chi)014:482: sems nyid ma 'dres par shan phyes shig /
NK036(chi)014:483: sems nyid phan par slar ma ldog cig /
NK036(chi)014:486: ces pas skye ba med pa'i dbyings su lam bstan
NK036(chi)014:487: pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro
NK036(chi)014:489: rgyan yongs su bkod pa ni rig pa tshad phebs kyi zhing khams dbyings rig rdzogs pa yin la /
NK036(chi)014:490: de ye shes lngas khyab pa'i snang ba yin zhing rtog pas g.yo ba med pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:491: rnal 'byor pas der phyin nas chos thams cad zad pa'i dbyings su phyin pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:492: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:493: 'jig rten mkhyen pa ni thugs rje 'gag pa med pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:494: skyes bu 'dul ba la sogs pa ni de nyid kyi yon tan yin no //
NK036(chi)014:495: 'od dpag tu med pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK036(chi)014:496: 'khor sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa ni rig pa'i sku dpag tu med pa yang yin la /
NK036(chi)014:497: sems can thams cad kyang de nyid kyi snying po can du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK036(chi)014:498: sems nyid mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ni tshogs
NK036(chi)014:499: brgyad gnas su gyur pa shin tu rnam par dag
NK036(chi)014:500: pa'i chos te / gnas dang ston pa dang 'khor
NK036(chi)014:501: dang chos thams cad gcig tu rtog pa ni dus
NK036(chi)014:502: pa'i chos te / te / de ltar sems dang ye shes mthar phyir pa'i don bshad pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:503: de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gnad 'ching ba ni lus gnad lnga ste /
NK036(chi)014:504: glang po che'i 'dug stangs kyis gzhi gcun /
NK036(chi)014:505: seng ge'i 'dug stangs kyis lus gcun /
NK036(chi)014:506: drang srong gi 'dug stangs kyis mig gcun /
NK036(chi)014:507: bya rgod kyi spungs stangs kyis snang ba yul dang bsre /
NK036(chi)014:508: rdo rje skyil krung gis spros med du la bzla ba'o //
NK036(chi)014:509: gzhan gyi spyod lam rnam bzhi thams cad kyang 'dug stangs kyi yan lag go //
NK036(chi)014:510: de la rig pa mngon sum bcun pa'i lta stangs bcu gnyis yod pa ni /
NK036(chi)014:512: glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gyen du bltas na dbyings rnam dag sgron ma mthong bar byed do //
NK036(chi)014:513: seng ge'i mchongs stabs ni der sdod pa ma yin te /
NK036(chi)014:514: thams cad la bltas la rig pa lu gu rgyud la lta ba'o //
NK036(chi)014:515: khyung nam mkha' la lding ba'i 'gros kyis nam mkha' thams cad du bltas te bzung ba'o //
NK036(chi)014:516: drang srong ni mi 'gyur bar brtan par bya ba'i thad kar mi 'gyur bar byed pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:517: glang chen nyal thabs ni snang ba de dang ma
NK036(chi)014:518: bral bar nyal bas gnyid log kyang thig le mthong
NK036(chi)014:519: ba'o // lcags sdong 'dril stangs ni mig gnyis ka'i
NK036(chi)014:520: mthar bltas na mu khyud kyi 'od brtan par byed
NK036(chi)014:521: ba'o // pa'o // skyes bu'i rgyang thabs ni g.yas
NK036(chi)014:522: g.yon steng 'og phyogs mtshams su khrid pas snang ba
NK036(chi)014:524: wa mo'i zur 'gros ni mig gi zur nas nang
NK036(chi)014:525: du bsdus te bltas pas rig pa nang du 'char
NK036(chi)014:526: ba'o // bya rgod spungs stangs ni yul snang dang
NK036(chi)014:527: dbyings bsres nas lta bar byed pas zhing khams mthong
NK036(chi)014:528: ba'o // ba'o // gyad ni srid pa dang zhi
NK036(chi)014:529: ba gnyis ka la mi gnas pa'i don du snang
NK036(chi)014:530: stong dbyer med du bsre ba'o //
NK036(chi)014:531: 'bu srin ni yul drug dang yul can thams cad
NK036(chi)014:532: zhib tu phyes nas dbyings dang shes rab kyis bsres
NK036(chi)014:533: pas rten 'brel mthong ba rang rgyal mthong ba'o //
NK036(chi)014:535: thod rgal gyi nyams len dang khregs chod gnyis phar len tshur len byas pas /
NK036(chi)014:536: byang chub sem dpa'i lam shes pa'i phyir bstan te /
NK036(chi)014:537: de rnams ni rig pa sbyong ba'i thabs so //
NK036(chi)014:538: de nas yang sems sbyong ba ni /
NK036(chi)014:544: shes rab kyis spang gnyen dbye /
NK036(chi)014:545: 'du byed kyis 'phangs pa'i las rgyun bcad pas /
NK036(chi)014:546: dang po nyon mongs su ma ldog /
NK036(chi)014:547: gnyis pa gnyen po ma ldog /
NK036(chi)014:548: gsum pa spros bral gyi zhen pa ma ldog /
NK036(chi)014:549: ces lan gsum bstan pas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
NK036(chi)014:550: don bshad pa rgyud rgyab yig bla ma'i man ngag bsgrigs so //
NK036(chi)014:554: de nas nyi ma gsum tsam lta ltangs la ngo sprad de nyams su len du gzhug go //
NK036(chi)014:555: 'di ni khams gsum las grol bar byed pa'o gdams ngag yang dag pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:556: rab tu spros pa med pa'i dbang gi phyag len /
NK036(chi)014:557: sprul pa po dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa dang /
NK036(chi)014:558: bla ma rnams kyi rgyab yig go sla zhing lag len bde bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK036(chi)014:559: rang byung rdo rjes bsdus pa'o //
NK036(chi)014:560: dam pa'i gdams ngag mi 'gal bar //
NK036(chi)014:561: rang byung rdo rjes bsdus pa la //
NK036(chi)014:562: nyes pa'i tshogs rnams gang mchis pa //
NK036(chi)014:563: bka' srung mkha' 'gros bzod par mdzod //
NK036(chi)014:564: slob ma mchog rnams kyis yang yang bskul ba'i phyir /
NK036(chi)014:565: yi ge thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa shin tu lag len bde bar yod do //
